[generators]
cmake

[requires]
boost/1.74.0
magic_enum/0.6.6
sdl2/2.0.12@bincrafters/stable
glm/0.9.9.8
glew/2.1.0
ctti/0.0.1@manu343726/testing
range-v3/0.11.0
lodepng/cci.20200615
ctre/3.3.2
entt/3.5.2

[options]
boost:header_only=True
sdl2:iconv=False
glew:shared=True

[imports]
bin, *.dll -> ./bin
lib, *.dll -> ./bin
bin, *.dylib -> ./bin
lib, *.dylib -> ./bin
bin, *.so -> ./bin
lib, *.so -> ./lib
